Translations.Text: geugeos-eun geudeul-i hananimgwa geubun ui seonjijaleul geoyeoghaessgi ttaemun-eulo nugudeunji hananimkke geoyeoghaneun janeun geuege museoun eungbeol-eul jusineola

neohuiga jonglyeonamuleul beeo neom-eotteuligeona ppulineun deuleonaeeo sewoduneun geos-eun hananim-ui heolag-e uihan geos-imyeo ilo hayeo geubunkkeseo saaghan jadeul-eul suchiseuleobge hagoja hasyeossnola

hananimkkeseo geudeullobuteo ppaeas a geubun-ui seonjija-ege hwan-wonhayeo jusin modeun geos-eun neohuiga geugeos-eul wihae mal-ina nagtalosseo wonjeonghan geos i anigeoneul hananimkkeseo geubun-ui seonjijadeullo hayeogeum geubun-i wonha neun ja wie issdolog gwonneung-eul jusyeoss-euni hananim-eun modeun il-e jeonjijeonneung hasim-ila

hananimkkeseo geu go-eul-ui baegseong deullobuteo ppaeas-a geubun-ui seonjija ege jusin modeun geos-eun hananimgwa seonjijawa chincheoggwa goadeulgwa pil-yo lo han salamgwa yeohaengjaleul wihan geos eulo neohui gaunde buyuhan ja-ege bunbaedoeneun geos-i anila geuligo seon jijakkeseo neohuiege jun geos-eun sulag hadoe geubunkkeseo geumgihan geos-eun geojeol hago hananim-eul dulyeowohala sillo hananim-eun eomhan eungbeol-eul naelisinila

ilbuneun muhajilin-eul wihan geos-eulo geudeul-eun hananim-ui eunhyewa geubun ui gippeum-eul chuguhago hananimgwa geu bun-ui seonjijadeul-eul dobgi wihayeo geu deul-ui gajeong-gwa geudeul-ui jaesan-eul beolyeo dun chae jjochgyeonan jadeullo geudeul-eun jinsilhan jadeul-ila

geuleona geudeul ijeon-e gajeong-eul gajgo mid-eum-eul gajyeossdeon jadeul-eun geudeul egelo ijuhayeo on salamdeul-eul sa langhayeossgo geudeul-ege bepul-eojin geos eulo sigihaji anihaess-eumyeo gananhamyeonseodo jasindeulboda geudeul-eul useon daeuhayeoss-eumyeo nuguegedeun ma-eum i insaeghaji anihaess-euni ideul-i beonseonghan jadeul-ila
